thread.section_title: The Knickerbocker - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Quality. All the way!
thread.title_full: Quality. All the way! - Review of The Knickerbocker, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Adrian D
title: Quality. All the way!
text:
Everything, we found, about The Knickerbocker was perfect.
The location. Walk out of the doors and you're in Times Square!
The rooms. Luxury, without being fussy.
The bed. Best nights sleep for years!
The staff. Nothing was too much trouble. We had the "feelgood" vibe from checking in - to checking out.
The roof top bar. A view to die for!
Jakeâ€™s @ The Knick - Perfect bagels and coffee! (and I'm not keen on bagels!)
And NO resort fee!. As long as that's still the case, we'll be back!
